dimensions: 27.2 x 21.2 cm (10 11/16 x 8 3/8 in.), irregular; mount: 31.3 x 24.1 cm (12 5/16 x 9 1/2 in.), irregular
title: Sketch of Coat of Arms with Lion Rampant
medium: Brush and watercolor, graphite on tracing paper mounted to cream paperboard tipped into binding with fabric
description: Vertical sheet with the outline of a shield sketched in graphite.  The upper fifth of the shield is colored in bright red, while part of the bottom section of the shield is colored ochre yellow with water spots very visible from the medium.  In the center is a royal blue lion rampant facing to the left.
name: Album page
